Usage¶

Once OCRParking is installed, you can run the project with the following command:

poetry run python main.py

Available features: - Admin Interface: Manage users, cars, tariffs, and blacklists. - User Interface: View parking history, manage cars, and make payments. - Camera System: Simulates entry and exit by capturing license plate images.

For API documentation and further usage instructions, refer to the module documentation below.
